short_summary: Chairs procurement for various naval bases in Canada.
description: Chairs procurement for various naval bases in Canada. A Request for Information Performance, (RFI-PERFORMANCE EVALUATION) has been issued by the Contracting Authority. (
full_summary:
# Chairs 2090 Tender Notice

## Solicitation Number
W8482-242012/A

## Publication Date
20 March 2024

## Closing Date for Tenders
15 April 2024 14:00:00

## Description
The Department of National Defence intends to acquire various chairs for use in the Canadian Armed Forces. The procurement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services.

## Required Products
The Department of National Defence requires the following products:

* Chair, Back Rest, CxF 2090, Lowe Gate Stadium, 6B-600A (Quantity: 6)
* Berth, Shipboard, CxF 2090, GAC-X-45435, 85-120-3BC-3600 (Quantity: 2)
* Berth, Shipboard, CxF 2090, GAC-X-45435, 85-120-3BC-3600 (Quantity: 4)
* Chair, Office, CxF 2090, 20-A0G0422, A184-21-AA (Quantity: 20)
* Latch, CxF 2090, 21-9045667, 8914267-02 (Quantity: 4)
* Latch, CxF 2090, 21-9045667, 8914267-02 (Quantity: 4)
* Berth, Shipboard, CxF 2090, 21-9045077, 8610801-67 (Quantity: 1)
* Berth, Shipboard, CxF 2090, 21-9045077, 8610801-67 (Quantity: 2)
* Chair, Pedestal, Radar and Sonar Operators, CxF 2090, 01-4578671, 106054-0300M (Quantity: 5)
* Chair, Pedestal, Radar and Sonar Operators, CxF 2090, 01-4578671, 106054-0300M (Quantity: 5)
* Console Chair, CxF 2090, 20-A0K-8346, 30002264 (Quantity: 50)

## Instructions to Suppliers
Bidders are required to submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected. Suppliers are also required to indicate any Equivalent or Substitute Product offered, along with the brand name and model, Part Number, and NCAGE.
